response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you and appreciate your interest. After careful consideration, we propose to sell the product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates the product's worth. We believe this price strikes a balance between maximizing the value for us and ensuring you receive an exceptional deal. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
